title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it doesn't take focus as expected. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it doesn't take focus as expected.
EB: The first Combo should take focus when clicked on.
SR:
1. Open the application with Photon theme.
2. Locate the first Combo element.
3. Click on the first Combo.
4. Observe if it gains focus.
